channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Governor Hochul signs New York's AI safety act
item.description: New York governor Kathy Hochul signed legislation on Friday aimed at holding large AI developers accountable for the safety of their models. The RAISE Act establishes rules for greater transparency, requiring these companies to publish information about their safety protocols and report any incidents within 72 hours of their occurrence. It comes a few months after California adopted similar legislation. But, the penalties aren't going to be nearly as steep as they were initially presented when the bill passed back in June. While that version included fines of up to $10 million dollars for a co...

item.title: Google and Apple reportedly warn employees on visas to avoid international travel
item.description: Law firms representing Google and Apple have reportedly warned that employees who need a visa stamp to re-enter the United States should avoid leaving the country due to longer-than-usual visa processing times.

item.title: Save 25% on this AMD combo: $116 gets you a 6-Core Ryzen CPU, Wi-Fi motherboard, and cooler
item.description: AMD Ryzen 5 mobo combo: $116 gets you a 6-core CPU, Wi-Fi motherboard, and cooler.

item.title: He Got a Bunch of Money Again
‘It felt so wrong’: Colin Angle on iRobot, the FTC, and the Amazon deal that never was
item.description: The iRobot founder opens up about the 18-month regulatory process that he says doomed the Roomba maker -- and what it means for American innovation.

item.title: The ‘Steel Ball Run’ Anime Rides to Netflix in March
item.description: 'Steel Ball Run,' the next chapter in the 'Jojo's Bizarre Adventure' saga, gets a new trailer ahead of its spring premiere.

item.title: OpenAI allows users to directly adjust ChatGPT’s enthusiasm level
item.description: ChatGPT users can now tweak the chatbot’s warmth, enthusiasm, and emoji use.

item.title: The Verge’s 2025 holiday gift guide
item.description: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we did […]

item.title: Sony's first EV with Honda will let you remotely play PS5 in your car
item.description: Faraway road trips just got a lot easier, at least for the passengers. Sony Honda Mobility, the joint venture between the two Japanese conglomerates created to produce electric vehicles, announced that its Afeela EV will come with PS Remote Play. While playing video games in a car may be a niche feature, it means drivers will have something to do when parked, and passengers can chip away at their favorite RPGs during long drives. According to the announcement, the Afeela will be able to run your PS5 and PS4 consoles remotely through the infotainment system's integrated display. You can even gr...
